title: Stocks Rise, Bonds Fall After Tariff Ruling | Closing Bell
description: Comprehensive cross-platform coverage of the U.S. market close on Bloomberg Television, Bloomberg Radio, and YouTube with Romaine Bostick, Katie Greifeld, Carol Massar and Emily Graffeo. (Source: Bloomberg)
